- [sighs]

- CAN YOU TOTALLY CHILL OUT?

WHAT COULD POSSIBLY

YEAH, THIS IS NICE,

- MEEGAN--

- THEY FLARED!

- MEEGAN, THEY [bleep]
DID NOT MOVE!

- YOUR NOSTRILS FLARED MORE THAN

- WHAT?

- HE'S NOT EVEN LOOKING ME
IN THE EYES.
OKAY, YOU KNOW WHAT?

IF YOU'RE JUST GOING TO CONTINUE

YOU'RE GONNA GET YOUR ASS

- DON'T TOUCH HIM, MEE--
MEEGAN.

- [scoffs]
CRAZY BITCH.
- [gasps]
[squeaks]
- [sighs]
OH!

- I TOTALLY LOVE MY NAILS
RIGHT NOW.

I'M SO OVER EVERYTHING
RIGHT NOW,

OVER THE FLOOR,
I'M OVER THE SKY, I'M OVER YOU,
OVER THAT PUSSY BACK THERE.
YOU'RE A PUSSY!

- MEEGAN, SERIOUSLY.
- WHATEVER.
- [makes kissing sounds]

- NICE LEGS, LITTLE LADY.
[laughter]
- UM, EXCUSE ME?
- OH, GOD!
- HEY, WHAT DID YOU SAY?

WHAT THE [bleep]
DID YOU JUST SAY?

YOU GUYS COME BACK HERE WITH
YOUR LITTLE ITTY-BITTY DICKS.
- YOU BEST CONTROL YOUR LADY.

- YUP.
- [gasps] EXCUSE--

"CONTROL YOUR LADY"?
NO, HE DOESN'T CONTROL ME,

'CAUSE LET ME TELL YOU
SOMETHING, I'M NOT A REMOTE.

- MEEGAN, BABY,
CAN WE JUST LET THIS GO?

- OH, BOY.
- YEAH, YOU.

WHY DON'T YOU ALL

AND WHY DON'T YOU JUST GO

- [gasps]

- [squeaks]

IT'S NOT EVEN THE PLURAL
OF "PENIS."

[punching thud]

[thugs laughing]

YES!
I FEEL INVINCIBLE!

LIKE I HAVE SUPER POWERS

YOU HEAR THAT,
ALL YOU [bleep] OF THE WORLD?

YOU CRAZY BITCH!
- [gasps]

comments.text:
Okay so you are saying there are no laws that are oppressive to women. 
Because there are for men. In family court, men only receive sole custody 
of their kids 10% of the time while division of assets is skewed to benefit 
the ex wife. In our prision system, for the same crime, women on average 
receive a 17 month sentance while men receive a 40 month sentance average. 
There are over 200 federally funded programs that solely help women while 
there aren't any federally funded programs that solely help men. Female 
genital multilation is illegal while male genitial multilation is legal. 
This is to name a few. But moving on from the law. 

The truth about the wage gap: for every dollar a man earns, a woman earns 
77 cents. The lie about the wage gap: for every dollar a man earns, a woman 
earns 77 cents for the same job. This figure from the census bureau does 
not factor that men on average retire later (the time of your life you've 
climbed the career ladder and make the most money), it doesn't factor that 
full time male workers on average work 7 hours longer per week than full 
time female workers, it doesn't factor that men take riskier jobs that pay 
more, it doesn't factor that women are usually the ones that take almost a 
decade off climbing the career ladders to raise their children. 

I am not saying that women don't have problems. But I am saying that (1) 
men are not the cause of their problems and (2) their problems are 
typically heard and cared about while problems that are solely men's 
problems are cared about a lot less if at all. By many of the standards 
that people cite to claim that blacks are oppressed compared to whites, men 
fare much worse on those standards compared to women.
comments.author: Greg Carlson

comments.text:
+Greg Carlson No laws, but there certainly is inequality. The wage 
difference is one prime example.

comments.text:

comments.text:
I'm gonna write something constructive because you people aren't getting 
it. My original comment is referring to the men who use that to talk shit 
on women, not about the women who want people to fight their fights. I know 
plenty of men who will be like "bring that boy home and he'll see what he 
has to deal with", "if he hurts you I'll kick his ass"; then they will 
watch this and see women expecting to be protected by such a little thing 
and say "yeah those bitches (or nits lmao) are crazy I can't believe they 
want us to fight for them on EVERYTHING".

So maybe I should be extra specific. If you are a male who tells your 
female relative/friend that you will hurt another male to protect her, then 
laugh at this and use this to talk shit on women, you are a hypocrite. If 
you are a man like this and you see this video and laugh because it's "SO 
RELATABLE", you put the women in your life in that position. You need to 
protect them 24/7 right?? 

If you are not like the men I have talked about, which I'm sure every fine 
gentleman who commented is definitely not, then you don't need to worry. 
Don't be so quick to offend yourselves.

comments.text:
+Eric Borders you know you have a very very valid point. anybody can claim 
to be anybody. so there is no way I can prove it to you so you won. however 
I was in wrestling for high school although im in 12th grade I thought it 
would be best to drop it for my homework but ive learned some boxing in 8th 
grade along with karate but ive been boxing with friends as well as 
practicing at la fitness. so I have a pretty good sense of boxing and 
im a pretty dang good wrestler. anyway I need to be able to find a good 
boxing class so I will learn more combos instead of what Ive been doing 
which is move around and land attacks and what I want most is to learn how 
to properly combine boxing and wrestling or in other words make those two 
a effective combo. oh and you don't need to say to anybody that they are 
the toughest because they're obviously not. the toughest are the navy 
SEALS, Green Bret's (marines), and the Rangers (army). so don't need to 
bother with that, it doesn't get any point across nor does it make the 
reader feel weaker because they obviously know that their not.
comments.author: Kumotai's best krav maga

comments.text:
+Kumotai's best krav maga First off kid I was not calling you the police, 
second I don't care who you claim to be or what you claim to know, your 
anonymity allows you to be who ever you want. You can claim to be the 
toughest guy online, but that don't make it so kid. You are a typical 
internet tough guy who tries to intimidate others by saying "I am a MMA 
fighter" and yes I know what it is having been in several octagons in my 
younger years. Go finish your homework kid.
comments.author: Homer Simpson II

comments.text:
+Eric Borders i don't understand why you begin to think im the police 
because that's far fetched. 2. im not the threat your comments are world 
wide (for those who can have youtube) so what you say to the public can be 
traced back to you. 3. there is no need to threaten a coward like yourself 
staying on a computer screen being racist. 4. what does my name have 
anything to do with a threat, its a name im a mixed martial artist (mma if 
you don't understand however almost everyone knows that) my nickname is 
"kumotai" I have a friend who knows Krav maga and its quite interesting.5 I 
know boxing and wrestling and fyi I don't need to fight a punk like 
yourself, you are no threat to me.
comments.author: Kumotai's best krav maga

comments.text:
+Eric Borders I keep getting notifications for this nonsense, so I'm plenty 
part of it. No, I think you're both kinda annoying, but you're the one 
who's escalating the situation. And honestly you must've expected some 
pushback from saying that all black women are like this, because obviously 
people would get pissed at that.
comments.author: silvertamagachi

comments.text:
+silvertamagachi You sound like the YouTube police, and if that's not the 
image you want to project, stop telling others what to do when you are not 
part of the conversation at hand. Krava maga likes to threaten others 
online from the safety of his keyboard, but that is ok because you agree 
with what he does right?? Get over yourself kid......
comments.author: Homer Simpson II

comments.text:
+Eric Borders You sound like a racist moron trying to act cooler than you 
are. If that's not an image you want to project, stop. +Kumotai's best krav 
maga Don't you know better than to feed the troll?
comments.author: silvertamagachi

comments.text:
+Kumotai's best krav maga Oh no I am really scared now. Are you going to 
show how tough you are by threatening to beat me up from the safety of your 
computer screen?? Spare me the internet tough guy act, you would be better 
off walking through hell with gasoline soaked shorts kid. You have no 
idea.....
